article_node.title: Belgium to Recognize Palestinian State, Joining Pressure on Israel
article_node.summary: Belgium announced it will formally recognize a Palestinian state at the upcoming United Nations General Assembly, a move contingent on the release of hostages and the removal of Hamas from governance. The recognition is part of a broader international effort to pressure Israel to end its war in Gaza. Belgium’s foreign minister Maxime Prévot stated the formalization would occur by royal decree once conditions are met.
